description.value:
You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos. The GM rolls a secret @Check[type:perception|defense:deception|traits:secret] check, comparing the result against the target's Deception DC.

Critical Success You ascertain the target's alignment.

Success You ascertain the target's alignment, but only along one axis (your choice of either the good-evil axis or the lawful-chaotic axis).

Failure You do not learn the target's alignment.

Critical Failure You incorrectly ascertain the target's alignment, misidentifying their alignment along either one axis or both (GM's choice).

publication.title: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
